titleStmt.title: Articles to be enquired of, throughout the whole diocesse of Chichester ministred and giuen in charge to the church-wardens and sidemen within the same diocesse by the reuerend father in God Richard by Gods prouidence Bishop of Chichester, in his generall visitation holden anno Domini 1631.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Chichester. Bishop (1628-1638 : Montagu)
Montagu, Richard, 1577-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.Y. for Thomas Bourne,
